channel.title: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]
channel.description:
Hey just wondering how i would go about making my server yell when someone gets 99 in a skill.
Eg
[server] @dre@ Avirunes has just gotten 99 thieving! @dre@

item.title: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:6, topic:381762”]sendMessage("" + c.playerName + " has reached level 99" + getSkillName(skill));

public String getSkillName (int skill) {
switch (skill) {
case 1:
return “attack”;
case 2:
return “strength”;
}
}[/quote]

gives me illegal start of expression :S for the public string line

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]

case 2:

item.title: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Post your errors and its probably because you need to put the:Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; Before your:c2.sendMessage("" + c.playerName + " has reached level 99" + skill); In your yelling the 99 skill.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]

item.title: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:381762”]You could try something like:

if (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) 
    c.sendMessageToAll("" + playerName + " has reached level 99" + skill);

Thanks

in the PlayerAssistant class, levelUp() method.[/quote]

thanks, tried it but getting compiler error :S

atm i have it as this

c2.sendMessage("" + c.playerName + " has reached level 99" + skill);

but im getting a cannot find symbol error over c2.sendMessage as im not sure what as to use to make it yell

(heres example of my hell)

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”) && c.playerRights == 3 && c.memberStatus >= 0) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("[@cr1@Owner@red@] " + c.playerName + “: @red@” + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)));

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]

item.title: How do i make server yell when someone gets 99 of a skill. [Pi] [317]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

You could try something like:

if (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]) == 99) 
    c.sendMessageToAll("" + playerName + " has reached level 99" + skill);

in the PlayerAssistant class, levelUp() method.

Read full topic
